import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const [isMessageSent, setMessageSent] = useState(false); const sendEmail = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await emailjs.sendForm( "service_x1hewh5", "template_2ki8hlo", form.current, "vxDcl4UI2jbOQBn6f" ); form.current.reset(); setMessageSent(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error sending email:", error); } }; return (
{isMessageSent ? (
